articles.title: Zelenskyy: Trump supports ceasefire and security guarantees for Ukraine at Putin summit - NPR
articles.description: European leaders held a high-stakes meeting Wednesday with President Trump, Vice President Vance, Ukraine's Volodymyr Zelenskyy and NATO's chief ahead of Friday's U.S.-Russia summit.
articles.content: BERLIN European leaders met virtually with President Trump on Wednesday, urging him to press Russian President Vladimir Putin for a ceasefire and security guarantees for Ukraine before any peace talk… [+1813 chars]
